EmailTemplate.subject: Accelerate 2015: 1 Day To Go!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Accelerate 2015 starts tomorrow at 8:30 AM! We are looking forward to welcoming you to an inspiring day discussing the future of software testing with industry experts from around the world, followed by dinner, drinks, and networking.
Don’t forget to tweet during Accelerate using the hashtag #TriAcc for a chance to win a pair of Marshall Headphones at the end of the day!
Location: Novomatic Forum <http://www.novomaticforum.com> Friedrichstraße 7 1010 Wien, Austria
<https://www.google.at/maps/dir/48.2013086,16.3688942/Novomatic+Forum,+Friedrichstra%C3%9Fe,+Wien/@48.2003768,16.36739,18z/data=!4m9!4m8!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x476d0784a766a0f3:0xd6b5de954061f676!2m2!1d16.36641!2d48.200036!3e2>
How to get there:
The Novomatic Forum is easily accessible by public transportation. Simply take the U1 (Red), U2 (Purple) or U4 (Green) subway line to Karlsplatz, and exit towards "Oper". It is about a 3 minute walk to the Novomatic Forum.
Parking Information:
For those arriving by car, there is a public parking garage a short walk from the Novomatic Forum. A one day parking voucher costs €37, to be paid to the garage.
See you soon!
Best Regards,
Your Tricentis Events Team
